18D252B749FCECF716DB11A91543EAEF: This device transposes note patterns from a Patchwork note generator, such as the Note Sequencer, to a different key. You can then output the note data to Patchwork devices like the Instrument Player or Omega Synthesizer.
5F8C4685421AA85FEB30B389C9F7D479: This device transposes note patterns from a Patchwork note generator, such as the Note Sequencer, to a different key. You can then output the note data to Patchwork devices like the Instrument Player or Omega Synthesizer.
0A151D0C4AD23E057890759C46DFE42A: When disabled, note data is passed through the device without any effect applied.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.SnapToScale.D: Controls whether the shifted note should stay in the scale of the song. If set to OFF, non-diatonic notes can pass through.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.PresetProgres: Cycles through a collection of chord progressions. Note that some presets are marked with Maj (Major) or Min (Minor) because they are traditionally used with this scale.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.AllowPortSele: Determines if the Patchwork Tool can access any cable input or output ports on the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.EnabledOnPhas: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled. Pre-game includes all phases prior to start of game (like the pre-game lobby or countdown to start of game.) This setting does not affect Edit Mode.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.StepLength.De: Determines the length of time to spend on each step.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.Disable.Descr: Disables the device when an event occurs.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.Enable.Descri: Enables the device when an event occurs.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.LegalInfo.Des: Please note: Use of a Patchwork audio device is limited to the creation of new and original musical works.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.NoteOut.Descr: Sets the destination for this device's Note Out cable.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.FirstInterval: Sets the inputs for this device's First Interval knob.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.FourthInterva: Sets the inputs for this device's Fourth Interval knob.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.GlobalIn.Desc: Sets the inputs for this device's Global toggle.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.NoteIn.Descri: Sets the inputs for this device's Note In port.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.PresetIn.Desc: Sets the inputs for this device's Preset carousel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.SecondInterva: Sets the inputs for this device's Second Interval knob.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.SnapToScaleIn: Sets the inputs for this device's Snap To Scale toggle.
Sets the inputs for this device's Step Length carousel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.ThirdInterval: Sets the inputs for this device's Third Interval knob.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.Step1.Descrip: Transposes the incoming notes based on the relative position of the scale degree chosen.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.Step2.Descrip: Transposes the incoming notes based on the relative position of the scale degree chosen.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.Step3.Descrip: Transposes the incoming notes based on the relative position of the scale degree chosen.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.Step4.Descrip: Transposes the incoming notes based on the relative position of the scale degree chosen.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.OnDisabled.De: Triggers an event when the device is disabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.OnEnabled.Des: Triggers an event when the device is enabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularProgressor_C.UseGlobalSett: When set to ON, shares device settings with all other Note Progressors that also have this setting enabled. This makes it easy to keep all Note Progressors in the same chord progression.
